name: Tactical Fussball
description:
How To Play:

This is a local two player game.

Players will take turns setting up a plan.

You are not supposed to know the other players' plan. So look away if it's not your turn.

Once both players have completed their plan the players on the board will start moving. 

The order in which the players move is determined by initiative, indicated with a number on the back. Higher numbers will move first.

If all players have moved and one or more players are in a position to kick the ball the player with the highest number will kick the ball in a straight line.

Score goals and win the match!

--------

This game is made for the Mix and Game Jam 2020. The theme of the jam was 'Mixing Genres'. We decided to mix the tactical turn based strategy genre with the sports genre, in this case football.
